meanings.definition: The act of pricking with a pin.
meanings.sent1: Her pinpricking of the fabric was precise and careful.
meanings.sent2: The pinpricking on the map marked the locations of important cities.
meanings.sent3: The pinpricking contest at the fair was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: His words felt like pinpricking, slowly piercing her heart.
meanings.sent5: The pinpricking sound of the sewing machine filled the room.

meanings.definition: The sensation of being pricked with a pin.
meanings.sent1: The sudden pinpricking on his skin made him jump.
meanings.sent2: She felt a pinpricking sensation on her fingertips after sewing for hours.
meanings.sent3: The pinpricking feeling in his leg turned out to be just a loose thread in his pants.
meanings.sent4: The pinpricking of raindrops on the window was soothing to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The pinpricking pain in her thumb reminded her to be more careful with needles.
